Divine Messenger Lydia:
Yes... The Corruptive Darkness.... It is the key to knowing what's going on here. It is better to feel I will not detain You with useless stories. But one more thing You should know. This is due to the Your personal security. Cursed Ancient Heroes will curse You. Their curse will change Your look You will become like themselves.
I call it Contamination. This condition has its pros and cons. On the one hand, it is dangerous to life, but gives tremendous strength. Whatever it was, I hope this experience will help You get closer to the truth. Are you ready?
